protocol.text: Plants were grown in Metromix300 soil in 18-pot trays in a growth chamber with 8h L/16h D and fertilized weekly beginning week 2.
Qiagen extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated aRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of aRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
The data were normalized using JMPGenomics (ver 3.0) with STD normalization and background correction feature.
